resources.string: Find the perfect food recipes category that you want.
Find the specific recipe you\'re looking for with search.
Quickly find your recipe by tags or keywords.
Pick out a recipe of your choice, click and get the exact details.
Visualize a beautiful way to prepare your food.
Share the recipe with your friends and family.
Each recipe includes nutritional information so you can always make healthy choice .

Smart Recipe is a food-focused mobile application with hundreds of easy and tasty recipes.\nAll recipes use simple ingredients that are easily available and inexpensive.\nIf you are interested in learning how to cook healthy and yet simple recipes you\'re in the right place.
What are you gonna cook today?
